    Configurable base class

    .. php:attr:: options

        protected array

    .. php:attr:: protocol

        protected Protocol

    .. php:method:: __construct($options = array())

        Configurable constructor

        :param $options:

    .. php:method:: configure($options)

        Configures the options

        :type $options: array

    .. php:method:: configureProtocol()

        Configures the protocol option
